make_base_laplace.description:
Make a Measurement that adds noise from the laplace(`scale`) distribution to a scalar value.
Adjust D to noise vector-valued data.

args.name: scale
args.description: Noise scale parameter for the laplace distribution. `scale` == sqrt(2) * standard_deviation.

args.name: D
args.description: Domain of the data type to be privatized. Valid values are VectorDomain<AllDomain<T>> or AllDomain<T>

make_base_gaussian.description:
Make a Measurement that adds noise from the gaussian(`scale`) distribution to the input.
Adjust D to noise vector-valued data.
The output epsilon may be no greater than one.
Use make_base_analytic_gaussian for a tighter analysis that supports epsilon > 1.

args.name: scale
args.description: noise scale parameter for the gaussian distribution. `scale` == standard_deviation.

args.name: D
args.description: Domain of the data type to be privatized. Valid values are VectorDomain<AllDomain<T>> or AllDomain<T>

make_base_analytic_gaussian.description:
Make a Measurement that adds noise from the gaussian(`scale`) distribution to the input.
Adjust D to noise vector-valued data.
The privacy relation is based on the analytic gaussian mechanism.

args.name: scale
args.description: noise scale parameter for the gaussian distribution. `scale` == standard_deviation.

args.name: D
args.description: Domain of the data type to be privatized. Valid values are VectorDomain<AllDomain<T>> or AllDomain<T>

make_base_geometric.description:
Make a Measurement that adds noise from the geometric(`scale`) distribution to the input.
Adjust D to noise vector-valued data.

args.name: scale
args.description: noise scale parameter for the geometric distribution. `scale` == sqrt(2) * standard_deviation.

args.name: bounds
args.description: Set bounds on the count to make the algorithm run in constant-time.

args.name: D
args.description: Domain of the data type to be privatized. Valid values are VectorDomain<AllDomain<T>> or AllDomain<T>

args.name: QO
args.description: Data type of the sensitivity, scale, and budget.

make_randomized_response_bool.description: Make a Measurement that implements randomized response on a boolean value.

args.name: prob
args.description: Probability of returning the correct answer. Must be in [0.5, 1)

args.name: constant_time
args.description: Set to true to enable constant time

args.name: Q
args.description: Data type of probability and budget.

make_randomized_response.description: Make a Measurement that implements randomized response on a categorical value.

args.name: categories
args.description: Set of valid outcomes

args.name: prob
args.description: Probability of returning the correct answer. Must be in [1/num_categories, 1)

args.name: constant_time
args.description: Set to true to enable constant time

args.name: T
args.description: Data type of a category.

args.name: Q
args.description: Data type of probability and budget.

make_base_ptr.description: Make a Measurement that uses propose-test-release to privatize a hashmap of counts.

args.name: scale
args.description: Noise scale parameter for the laplace distribution. `scale` == sqrt(2) * standard_deviation.

args.name: threshold
args.description: Exclude counts that are less than this minimum value.

args.name: TK
args.description: Type of Key. Must be hashable/categorical.

args.name: TV
args.description: Type of Value. Must be float.
